@allofyall First let's make this clear, Naruhina was made real after the nigga finally realized how much he cared about her and how much she cared for him. Next, Naruto's reasons to get Sasuke back was 1/4th done so he could make Sakura happy (cementing it with their promise) and 3/4ths done out of desperation to save the one person he felt he could relate to as a child, but then couldn't save at the most critical point in his life (puberty and shit), while still believing that they're the same but have followed different paths. Also, Sakura and Sasuke's relationship was probably formed by Sasuke out of compromise and guilt for the only woman that has loved him throughout his life despite everything he's done. Finally, Sasuke knows full well that most people only "accept" his place in konoha because he is Naruto's best friend, the father of Sarada, Sakura's (un?)requited true love/husband (they're married right?), and now remains to be one of  the village's most powerful shinobi.

Yep, his whole journey to get Sasuke back was based around trying to make Sakura happy. It also takes the time to make the pointless comparison of Sakura and Naruto's mother. I honestly think it was going that way and then the author changed his mind at the last minute to appease the Sasuke fangirls. Sakura's crush was just like Ino's. Shallow. He was the cool mysterious brooding guy. He also tried to kill his wife multiple times, showed that he didn't like her, tried to take over the world, and even after he has a kid with her, he neglects both of them because he's always traveling. While Naruto saved Sakura and went out of his way to make her smile. Made no fucking sense from a stroy point of view.

You know what I'm glad most hentai is of Sakura having an affair on Sasuke with the man she could've ended up with, and Sasuke cheating on her with her master. And poor Hinata she doesn't get pleasure from Naruto even though she is his wife. Hell Naruto can have the best of both worlds fucking Hinata and Sakura. Rant over

It's just funny how Naruto married Hinata even though he clearly still had feelings for Sakura before The Last. Sasuke has never shown any sign of love towards Sakura. Hell Hinata's whole purpose was to get with Naruto but at least It's shown why Her and Naruto became a couple. With Sakura and Sasuke it's literally summed as "well gotta continue the legacy of my clan since I'm the only full blooded Uchiha left on this world, who was the only person who ever truly "loved" me? oh yeah. Hey Sakura you always wanted this Uchiha dick right? Come here we're making a baby."YES SASUKE-KUN!!!! I BEEN WAITING FOR THIS MOMENT MY ENTIRE LIFE!!! Honestly for the most part Sasuke cared for her as an ally, a friend who fought for his teammates. Sakura has never really explained why she loves him or what is it about Sasuke that makes her love him so much. The only justified reason is "oh he's a Uchiha so he's hot, badass, and his clan is so awesome oooh Sasuke-kun" thats it.

It made no fucking sense for Sakura to end up with Sasuke (he didn't like her, he tried to kill her multiple times, and her "love" for him was nothing more than a shallow crush). Glad most hentai is of her getting plowed by Naruto.
